activities.details:
On session end (X, Alt+F4, crash, reset), capture a summary of the last ~10 messages/actions. On next app launch in that project folder, buddy shows the summary in a pixel-art chat bubble above his head with real-time text fill and chat sound effects (same as deliberations).

Approach options to deliberate:
A) Detached Node subprocess on close event -- spawned with detached:true, summarizes, writes file
B) Rolling buffer -- continuously write last N activity items so crash just uses the buffer as-is (no AI call needed)
C) Hybrid -- rolling buffer for crash safety, AI summary on clean exit for nicer output
